title: My account was transferred without my consent, and bank account information used.
body:
I had to make this other account because I am unable to even log into my actual account, not because I don't know the password or username, but because I am being transferred to another server and I have no idea what one, which I didn't even do myself! They have also used my bank info which I have already taken care of, however I cannot create a ticket outside of the email system which here is my ticket number below

#31301155

My issue is that the ticket came out in french when I got the auto email, so I don't even know if its going to the right place, just very depressed at the moment, had my account for a long time and people are just ruining my day.

{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Just got it back today, thanks to the timely and awesome response by Riot Mooperdoodle in customer support <3

Rip, best of luck that you can get your account back. 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

You did the right thing submitting that ticket in! Our Account Recovery Team will investigate the Transfer and the Billing issues on your account and undo any of the transactions that took place. It can take a bit to get a reply, but a specialist will be there to help you out soon.
